overview: The family of Madiha (Magda Khatib) lives in a family atmosphere that is happy and loving with her husband and daughter, but her happiness does not last long when Madiha is surprised by the appearance of things and people inside her villa trying to kill her and telling her aunt that her mother was killed by the villa. A mental illness was deposited in the hospital mental illness, which was the cause of suicide ... The husband tries to help his wife Madiha ask the doctor Salah treatment and if it finds out what was not in mind.
title: البيت الملعون
